transcript:
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji sir aapne meeting mein sir join nahi kiya.
Customer: Are wo ho nahi raha madam mere ko.
Executive: Nahi ho raha tha to uske baad fir kaise karenge bataiye main to guide kar rahi thi aapko ki kaise karna hai.
Customer: Mujhe to kuch nahi lag raha hai isme kya karna hai isme.
Executive: Chaliye koi nahi main aapko lead ye to yahi utha ke fek rahe ho aap.
Customer: Koi aur nahi hai sir jiske pass.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Aur kahan wo us time aur hi tha koi wahi dab gaya.
Executive: Main keh rahi hu theek hai sir main aapko na lead share karti hu aap usi pe baat kariye fir.
Customer: Haan aap lead share kar par kahan hai wo wo nahi raha na maine bataya ye to purani to aap bol rahe the 10 minute purani hai maine wo.
Executive: Sir pehle ki to hai dikha hua hai 10 minute pehle ki lead hai.
Customer: Ab bhejo main dekhta hu.
Customer: Dhanki koi bhejo log keh rahe hain hum kar rahe hain mere fir kya hindi mart se dushmani hogi.
Customer: Mere ko to ek kursi bhi nahi mili almari bhi ra do dining kuch bhi.
Customer: Kyun nahi mil raha karan kya hai ya to aap bhej nahi rahe ho.
Executive: To sir aapko bhi to bata rahe hain ki kaise use karna hai ab aapko bhi samajh mein bhi nahi aa raha hai aapko chahiye bhi to kaise sir aise possible hoga aap bataiye.
Customer: Are ab kya samjhenge do teen mahina aur hai fir aap delete kar denge number.
Customer: Do do teen mahina aur golmal chalo fir aur mere ko to bharosa nahi hai india mart pe.
Customer: Mera to saal kharab kar diya main yahan main kahin aur laga rehta na lakhon rupye kama ke nikalta.
Customer: Jeb se paise hi gaye aur samay chali gayi meri.
Executive: Use bhi to nahi kar pa rahe abhi keh raha hu main to abhi.
Customer: Abhi bhi la do main to keh raha hu sabse request kar raha hu.
Executive: Jab tak use nahi karenge tab tak sir kaise milega aapko.
Customer: Kaise use nahi kar raha regular kar raha hu kaise use nahi kar raha use wala chodo aap ye to wo to us time do mahine pehle nahi ab to main regular kar raha hu na.
Customer: Kaise use nahi kiya.
Customer: Hai hi nahi madam dur wale lete nahi hai Rajasthan ki aap Jodhpur ki bhejte ho to Jodhpur wala to main yahan baitha hu 20 30 saal se sabko janta hu main yahi le aaunga order bhi.
Executive: Haan main bhejti hu aapko.
Customer: Jodhpur ke alava 30 jile 40 jile madam Rajasthan mein 50 jile Jodhpur ke alava aap kahin ka bhi bhejo.
Executive: Sir search karte time aap apna location daliye kariye.
Customer: Jo jyada dur hai na.
Executive: Haan main bhejti hu sir.
Customer: Kaise kaise kya karna hai bataiye nahi ab ab bataiye aap.
Executive: Location laga denge sir to wahan se aa jayega.
Customer: Se bahar hai aap lead bhejo main lagata hu.
Executive: Already create kar diya hai.
Customer: Dur wale log kya karte hain fir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer did not join the meeting.

- Not receiving relevant leads; mostly from Jodhpur.

- Feels cheated; wasted time and money.

- Unable to understand how to use the platform.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to share leads.

- Executive asked to set location while searching.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, refund, meeting
